summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (10 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (10), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (4), Porfiry Petrovich (4), Pulcheria Alexandrovna Raskolnikova (4)
story_summary: Katerina Ivanovna pleads with Pyotr Petrovitch to protect her family, but he dismisses her, focusing instead on accusing Sonia of stealing a hundred-rouble note. As tension escalates, Sonia, terrified, insists she took nothing and offers back the ten-rouble note Luzhin had given her. Despite her protests, a folded hundred-rouble note is found in Sonia's pocket, leading to chaos as Katerina defends her.
